org.pentaho.di.core.database
Class SelectCountTests

java.lang.Object
  org.pentaho.di.core.database.SelectCountTests

public class SelectCountTests
extends Object

Tests the value returned from org.pentaho.di.core.database.DatabaseInterface.getSelectCountStatement for the database the interface is fronting. As this release, Hive uses the following to select the number of rows: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM .... All other databases use: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ....
